name: West Palm Beach
description: Licensed West Palm Beach electricians providing 24/7 expert residential and commercial services. From historic downtown restorations to luxury waterfront lighting, Solomon Electric is your trusted local choice.
tagline: The City of West Palm Beach

challenges.title: Historic District Preservation
challenges.description: Neighborhoods like El Cid and Flamingo Park feature historic architecture that requires specialized electrical skills to modernize systems while preserving integrity.

challenges.title: Booming Commercial Growth
challenges.description: The rapid development of West Palm's downtown and corporate corridors requires electricians who can manage complex commercial power and advanced lighting systems.

challenges.title: Coastal Weather Protection
challenges.description: With its extensive waterfront, West Palm properties need robust surge protection and corrosion-resistant materials to withstand South Florida's coastal environment.

faqs.question: We bought a historic home in El Cid—what electrical challenges should we expect?
faqs.answer: El Cid and Flamingo Park have some of Palm Beach County's most beautiful historic homes, but many still have original 1920s-1940s electrical systems. Common issues include knob-and-tube wiring, 60-amp fuse boxes, insufficient outlets, and ungrounded systems. The challenge is modernizing these homes to handle AC, modern kitchens, and home offices while preserving their architectural character. We've completed dozens of historic West Palm rewiring projects—it's one of our specialties.

faqs.question: How is working with Palm Beach County permits different from South Miami-Dade or Broward?
faqs.answer: Each Florida county has different permit processes, inspection schedules, and fee structures. Palm Beach County tends to be more thorough in inspections and has specific requirements that differ from Miami-Dade and Broward. We're experienced with Palm Beach County building department procedures and handle all permitting for West Palm Beach projects. Our 100% inspection pass rate means your project won't face delays.

faqs.question: Can you install landscape lighting for our Intracoastal property in West Palm?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Waterfront properties in West Palm Beach—along Flagler Drive, the El Cid waterfront, and throughout the Intracoastal neighborhoods—benefit tremendously from professional landscape lighting. We design and install systems that highlight your property's best features, enhance security, and withstand the coastal environment. Low-voltage LED systems keep operating costs minimal while providing stunning nighttime aesthetics.

faqs.question: We're opening a business near The Square (CityPlace)—do you handle commercial electrical?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide commercial electrical services throughout downtown West Palm Beach. Whether you're doing a tenant buildout, installing specialty lighting for a restaurant, adding circuits for new equipment, or need ongoing maintenance, we handle commercial projects from small retail to multi-story office buildings. We understand that construction timelines are tight and coordinate efficiently with general contractors.

faqs.question: Our West Palm home is all-electric with no gas—is a generator worth it?
faqs.answer: For all-electric homes, a standby generator is particularly valuable because you have no backup cooking, water heating, or HVAC options during outages. West Palm Beach experiences power outages from hurricanes, summer storms, and occasional infrastructure issues. A properly sized generator keeps your entire home running automatically. For all-electric homes, we typically recommend generators that can power the full house including AC—not just essential circuits.

faqs.question: How quickly can you respond to emergencies in West Palm Beach?
faqs.answer: We maintain Palm Beach County coverage to serve West Palm Beach and surrounding areas. For situation-specific emergencies—such as sparking or complete power loss—we prioritize the allocation of technical resources.

seoContent.heading: Trusted West Palm Beach Electricians Since 2003
seoContent.body: West Palm Beach is a vibrant, historic city that serves as the heart of Palm Beach County. From its bustling downtown to its beautifully preserved neighborhoods, it's a place of incredible energy and growth. Solomon Electric is proud to serve West Palm residents and businesses with the professional excellence they deserve.

seoContent.heading: Understanding West Palm Beach's Electrical Needs
seoContent.body: West Palm Beach homes and businesses have unique electrical requirements that demand local expertise. Our electricians understand Palm Beach County building codes, climate considerations, and the specific challenges of South Florida electrical systems. From aging infrastructure in established neighborhoods to modern smart home installations, we provide solutions tailored to West Palm Beach's needs.

seoContent.heading: Comprehensive Electrical Services for Your West Palm Beach Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading an older home's electrical system, installing modern energy-efficient lighting, adding an EV charger, or facing an urgent electrical issue, our licensed team delivers professional solutions throughout West Palm Beach. Our licensed team follows all safety protocols, respects your property, and maintains the technical standards that have defined our South Florida service for over {{YEARS_EXPERIENCE}} years.

seoContent.heading: Reliable Electrical Solutions for West Palm properties
seoContent.body: Whether you're developing a new commercial space near The Square, upgrading your family home in Flamingo Park, or requiring urgent help near the waterfront, our licensed team is ready. We provide professional service, clean workmanship, and a dedication to safety that West Palm Beach has trusted for {{YEARS_EXPERIENCE}} years.
